announcements.headline: Aerial Yoga in March!
announcements.body: Sign up for Aerial Yoga in March on Fridays at 12:30. Contact Tracy or Stacy or message us on Facebook.

announcements.headline: Come try TRX lunchtime workout!
announcements.body:
TRX (Total Resistance Exercise) is a drop in class on Mondays & Wednesdays 12:15 to 1:00 pm. 
$5 per class.
Low impact and scalable for all fitness levels.

announcements.headline: Try any regularly scheduled martial arts class for free
announcements.body: Just try to let the instructor know you're coming & show up a few minutes early. ðŸ˜‰ See the calendar link below for class schedules.

announcements.headline: Gym membership only is no longer offered.
announcements.body: We are no longer able to offer gym memberships. Sorry for any disappointment. If you had a membership, you have not been billed the last two months. Class members and PT clients may use the gym during class/training hours.
